# 1933 Holy Cross Crusaders football team

The 1933 Holy Cross Crusaders football team was an American football team that represented the College of the Holy Cross as an independent during the 1933 college football season.  In its first year under head coach Eddie Anderson, the team compiled a 7â€“2 record. The team played its home games at Fitton Field in Worcester, Massachusetts.
